assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that the research was conducted in the absence of any commercial or financial relationships that could be construed as a potential conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ethical review/approval and written informed consent were not required for the study on human participants in accordance with the local legislation and institutional requirements.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All the authors agreed with the content of this manuscript.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All the authors agreed that this manuscript be submitted to the journal of Human Genetics for publication.
